title: Breaking Open the Piggy Bank: How Best to Display Data
question_text: Joey just broke open his piggy bank and counted $128\text{ pennies}$ , $77\text{ nickels}$ , $43\text{ dimes}$ , and $28\text{ quarters}$ .  Now he wants to produce a figure to display the relative frequency of each type of coin from his piggy bank. Which of the following graphs would be most appropriate?
